data.actual_result: You won't see changes unless you click on voice channel to open it.
data.expected_result: You should be able to see the changes they have made right from the left panel
data.short_description: Can't see if a user had muted/unmuted or deafen/undeafen unless you click on vc tab to refresh.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel with anyone. - Ask them to either mute/unmute or deafen/undeafen. - Notice the change
